ygData.subject: Re: Direwolf Fur Cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: Funny you should mention this quest...I had just found out about it yesterday whilst cruizing thru Allakhazam. The MQ Dire Wolf Fur seems easy enough to come
ygData.messageBody:
Funny you should mention this quest...I had just
found out about it yesterday whilst cruizing thru
Allakhazam. The MQ Dire Wolf Fur seems easy enough to come
by, but the skinning stones seem to be the trick. Are
these stones No Drop? And are they easy enought to
spot? This cloak seems like it would really fit nicely
in my ensemble of equipment. <br><br>After your
response to my last post, I decided to try and get equip
that boosts STR and DEX to assist in melee and kiting.
Other than this cloak, what other items would you
suggest for leggings, waist, and arms that a 22 Ranger
can hope to successfully quest? I have the bone plate
arms now that add +5 STR, but they also have -4
DEX...a hindrance, so would like to replace them. Was
having a blast collecting Faydark Armor in Firiona Vie,
alas, it only enhances CHA...a stat that means little
to me. While I like the rich green color, I more
thoroughly enjoy gifting it to bards...if only to add chaos
to the color scheme of their wardrobe
;-)<br><br>Thanx again!<br><br>Quynnelleon<br>Ranger of 22
Seasons<br>Bane of Goblin Battlemasters<br>Favored customer of
Freelancing Clerics<br>Certified SoW addict
